page.title: 02GAMES CHILDREN PLAY.
page.content: {SOFTBALL_}Two teams stand opposite each other.One person from each team goes behind the other team.Someone throws the ball to the back person who then returns it.If two throws are achieved without the ball bouncing the team can try to hit someone from the opposite team below the knee.If they do so the person who was hit joins the back line.The team with the fewest people left are the losers.{LAST ONE {TO THE OAK TREE_}Last one to the oak tree has been a unique and popular game in Condover for generations.It is played between a gate and an oak tree. Everyone rushes to the tree shouting "last one to the oak tree is on it". Who ever is last is "on".Everyone runs to the gate which is "den" where you are safe.If the chaser touches you you are "on" too.This continues until everyone is"on" when we start again.
